show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Close To the Breaking Point
content:
Hoping for better times morphed into expecting better times which morphed into feeling entitled to better times… which... <!--more--> is where we are today.
But the party’s over.
Savings have been whittled away and the retirement plans themselves have failed the populace.
One third of all households are entirely dependent on social security.
 Over half retirees have less than $25,000 in savings.
 We are truly close to the breaking point.
Jobs will continue to be lost at a frightening pace.
Another clip from Nigel Farage talking about the future of Europe.
The argument for deflation ahead.
Stock market comment.
An update on the ‘economic recovery’.
The Japanese trade deficit fell again, creating the longest uninterrupted streak of falls since records began in the 1970s.
